title: Form Validation - Error Messages
description: Verify that appropriate error messages are displayed for invalid form inputs.
preconditions: User is on the test showcase page.

steps.action: Enter a username with less than 3 characters
steps.expected_result: Error message 'Username must be at least 3 characters' is displayed

steps.action: Clear the username field and enter a valid username

steps.expected_result: Error message 'Please enter a valid email address' is displayed

steps.action: Clear the email field and enter a valid email
Enter a password with less than 8 characters
steps.expected_result: Error message 'Password must be at least 8 characters' is displayed

steps.action: Clear the password field and enter a valid password
